forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly clear, with a low around 60. West wind around 13 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush blankets the cityscape, hinting at a day poised between the lingering embrace of night and the vibrant pulse of day. The forecast promises only a whisper of drizzle as the air shifts towards a clear sunlit melody. With a low around 60, the cool touch of the west wind carries a promise of renewal, weaving through the streets with an invigorating grace.

As the sun rises higher, expect a slight chance of morning drizzle drifting away by late morning. The warmth will gradually rise to a comfortable 72, with a graceful decline in temperature as afternoon appears. The skies, kissed by sunshine, will bask in a bright clarity with soft winds whispering at 10 to 17 mph, veering towards the southwest. While the possibility of mist may still lurk near the bay, it will retreat, allowing the majestic outline of the Golden Gate Bridge to emerge with clarity. 

To best relish this day, consider donning light layers, perhaps a breathable shirt with a light jacket for the morning chill that can easily transition into the warmth of the afternoon. This is a day made for simple pleasures, whether it’s a quiet stroll along the Embarcadero, where the world seems to belong only to you and the soft lapping of the water, or perhaps settling into a favorite café, cradling a warm cup of coffee while watching the city awaken from its slumber. Capture the exquisite blend of tranquility and gentle activity that a San Francisco morning uniquely offers, enjoying the sights and sounds that only the Bay can deliver.
